prompt: Subject: Female Singer (Eleven, late 20s with dark long flowing hair). Context: Open field at sunset. Action: Singing with serene confidence, subtle hand gestures gently rising and falling, slight swaying to the rhythm. Style: Warm, romantic, cinematic with soft-focus dreamlike visuals. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow push-in (dolly) from eye level. Composition: Transitions from medium shot to close-up, framing her upper body and face. Ambiance: Golden hour lighting casting a halo effect, warm golden tones, soft glow on skin and hair.
label: sing
